description: Quality checks for research and investigation tasks

checks.name: Citation Verification
checks.description: All claims must have verifiable sources
criteria: Every factual claim has a source citation
Sources are accessible and can be verified

checks.name: Topic Coverage
checks.description: Ensure comprehensive coverage of research topic

checks.name: Source Quality
checks.description: Evaluate authority and credibility of sources
criteria: Sources are current (within last 2-3 years unless historical)
Mix of academic, industry, and authoritative sources

checks.name: Factual Accuracy
criteria: Key statistics verified from multiple sources

passCriteria: Research must be well-sourced, comprehensive, and accurate
